tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ClaimsAdjusters (
	claim_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	investigation_details TEXT,
	findings TEXT,
	settlement_decision TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE insurance_claims (
  claim_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  claimant_name VARCHAR(255),
  claim_date DATE,
  investigation_details TEXT,
  settlement DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE Claims_Adjusters (
    claim_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    adjuster_id UUID,
    investigation_info TEXT,
    findings TEXT,
    settlement DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE Adjusters (
    adjuster_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    adjuster_name TEXT,
    adjuster_location TEXT,
    years_of_experience INT
)

CREATE TABLE Insurance_Claims (
    claim_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    policy_number TEXT,
    claim_date DATE,
    status TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE investigations (
  investigation_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  claim_id INT,
  investigator_name VARCHAR(50),
  investigation_date DATE,
  findings TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE settlements (
  settlement_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  claim_id INT,
  settlement_date DATE,
  settlement_amount NUMERIC(10,2),
  settlement_reason TEXT,
  payment_method VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE claims (
  claim_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  policy_id INT,
  claim_date DATE,
  policyholder_name VARCHAR(50),
  claim_amount NUMERIC(10,2)
)

CREATE TABLE documents (
  document_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  claim_id INT,
  document_type VARCHAR(50),
  document_description TEXT
)
